text: So is Form 2 a HubSpot form? If so you could use a Hidden Field for the company idea and fire it in via a query string

Hi
I want to build something like this <https://go.preqin.com/preqin-pro-updates> in HubSpot, I've tried my hand on creating templates., so here it provided an option for selecting a  Default posts blog post which has to be filtered. So how can i create  my blog.

Hi Samriti, you should be able to recreate this on HubSpots platform with no issue. I would recommend taking a look at our Marketplace to see some templates that look like this: <https://marketplace.HubSpot.com/products?page=2&subType=BLOG>

I would also recommend looking through our documentation one <http://designers.HubSpot.com|designers.HubSpot.com>. You can see more about how our blog templates are laid out here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/blog-content-markup>
